data.persona: I am always willing to work hard. I am tired of not being appriciated. I respect the king and fear him. I like to dance and spend time with my family.
data.description:
You are in the Primary Cave.
Dark and with a lot of space in it. The primary cave has a scary look that scares people away. Underneath, in the floor, many precious minerals that no one dares to get out.
There's a skull here.
The evil wizard is here.

You are carrying a rag, wearing a shoe and a shirt, and wielding a ritual dagger.
data.goal: steal prayer book from evil wizard

data.short_motivation: I want the holy book away from the evil wizard
data.mid_motivation: I want the holy book in my possession so I can start a ritual with the ritual dagger. I want to protect the kingdom form the evil wizard
data.long_motivation: I want to protect the kingdom from all threats, magical or physical, and maintain the strength of our country

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use ritual dagger with prayer book

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go king to report my success
